elements.name: Navigate to Red Badger and perform basic navigation

steps.name: I will see the text "We work with you to deliver digital products that make a difference to people."

arguments.val: We work with you to deliver digital products that make a difference to people.

steps.name: I will see the text "Do the right thing."
I will see the text "This is what we believe – and what the founders say after a couple of pints"
